mapper.insert: insert into sea_co_news (n_id, tid, n_title, n_keyword, n_pic, n_hit, n_author, n_addtime, n_letter, n_outline, tname, n_from, n_inbase, n_entitle, n_content) values (#{nId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tid,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{nTitle,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{nKeyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nPic,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{nHit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nAuthor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nAddtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nLetter,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{nOutline,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{tname,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{nFrom,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{nInbase,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{nEntitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update sea_co_news set tid = #{tid,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, n_title = #{nTitle,jdbcType=CHAR}, n_keyword = #{nKeyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, n_pic = #{nPic,jdbcType=CHAR}, n_hit = #{nHit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, n_author = #{nAuthor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, n_addtime = #{nAddtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, n_letter = #{nLetter,jdbcType=CHAR}, n_outline = #{nOutline,jdbcType=CHAR}, tname = #{tname,jdbcType=CHAR}, n_from = #{nFrom,jdbcType=CHAR}, n_inbase = #{nInbase,jdbcType=CHAR}, n_entitle = #{nEntitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, n_content = #{nContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where n_id = #{nId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select n_id, tid, n_title, n_keyword, n_pic, n_hit, n_author, n_addtime, n_letter, n_outline, tname, n_from, n_inbase, n_entitle, n_content from sea_co_news where n_id = #{nId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select n_id, tid, n_title, n_keyword, n_pic, n_hit, n_author, n_addtime, n_letter, n_outline, tname, n_from, n_inbase, n_entitle, n_content from sea_co_news
